Certainly! Based on their interest in sci-fi with a softer touch, I would recommend two movies from the list: 

1) "Her" (2013) - This film explores themes of love and loneliness through the relationship between an artificial intelligence named Samantha and her human owner Robert. The soft tone of this film is achieved through its gentle pace and emotive performances by the cast.

2) "Elysium" (2013) - This science fiction film directed by Neill Blomkamp follows the story of a man named Max who survives a dystopian future in which the majority of humanity has been forced to live on Mars. The soft tone of this film is achieved through its gentle pace and emotive performances by the cast.

I hope these recommendations are helpful in fulfilling their desire for a softer touch in sci-fi with humor.
